UNAUTHORIZED.DEFAULT: You must be logged in to access here.
UNAUTHORIZED.PERMISSIONS: The user does not have the required permissions to perform this action, permissions required: {permissions}
UNAUTHORIZED.MAX_LOGIN_ATTEMPTS: You have reached the maximum number of login attempts.

BAD_REQUEST.DEFAULT: Something went wrong with the request.

FORBIDDEN.DEFAULT: You don't have access to do that.

CONFLICT.DEFAULT: You don't have access to do that.
CONFLICT.EMAIL_ALREADY_TAKEN: The email {email} is already in use.
CONFLICT.ROLE_NAME_ALREADY_TAKEN: The role name is already in use.
CONFLICT.NO_ADMINS: There must be at least one admin user.
CONFLICT.REQUEST_ALREADY_EXISTS: Request already sent, please wait for the response.
